alert.note: Alert for Anasco (Puerto Rico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued September 19 at 8:53AM ADT until September 19 at 3:00PM ADT by NWS San Juan
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 745 PM AST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive runoff is expected along Rio Anasco and its tributaries. * WHERE...Anasco. * WHEN...Until 745 PM AST Monday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 750 AM AST, Flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the warned area. - Additional rainfall amounts of 3 to 5 inches are possible in the warned area. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
